info.name: The Bell Tree - 2020 Fair Theme
info.description: In August and the first half of September in 2020, The Bell Tree used a dreamy, starry theme to represent the slumber party theme of the fair. As that is now over, the forum returned to its normal look, but for those that love the theme and never want it to go away, this theme recreates the temporary theme as closely as possible. You can even give every user one of the three limited-time sidebar backgrounds!
info.additionalInfo: Updated style images to use the actual images still on TBT's server. When these disappear, the Imgur mirrors will be used instead.
